DOC.brief_summary: To determine routinely available 10 % povidone-iodine swabs effective saline 3M Skin Nasal Antiseptic 5 % Povidone-Iodine USP decolonizing MRSA .
DOC.brief_title: Nasal Swab studyComparison Effectiveness Povidone-iodine Versus Saline Versus 3M Skin Nasal Antiseptic 5 % Povidone-Iodine USP Swabs Decolonizing Intranasal MSSA/MRSA
DOC.criteria: 1 . All potential total hip total knee arthroplasty candidate 2 . All femoroacetabular osteoplasty patient 3 . All pelvic acetabular osteotomy patient 4 . All core decompression patient 1 . Any trauma patient 2 . Any tumor patient 3 . Any patient periprosthetic joint infection 4 . Any patient surgical site infection 5 . Any patient know MRSA infection 6 . Any patient allergic povidoneiodine 7 . Patients thyroid disease
